pages.text: ApiElectric includes several machines powered by HoneyCharge. Each serves a specific purpose in your bee-powered technology network.$(br2)This entry covers the basic machines you'll need to effectively utilize your HoneyCharge production.

pages.title: Honey Charge Furnace
pages.text: The Honey Charge Furnace functions like a standard furnace but operates twice as fast when powered by HoneyCharge. It consumes 20 HC per operation.

pages.title: Furnace Operation
pages.text: To use the Honey Charge Furnace:$(br)1. Connect it to your HoneyCharge network$(br)2. Insert items to be smelted$(br)3. The furnace will automatically use HC to process items$(br2)The furnace can hold up to 10,000 HC and will glow when operating.
